Constructor for initializing an error message indicating the validation config is unset.

<Note>
  `ValidationConfigUnsetError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs
  for PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { ValidationConfigUnsetError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```
